strings:
<voice_0x01001311><se_def>*: I am Marek, the herb doctor of Orkutsk.
I was gathering herbs here in this cave when suddenly some wolves attacked me.

<voice_0x01001312><se_def>Marek: I panicked and ran deep inside.
Then I got trapped by the falling icicles
and could not get out.

<voice_0x01001313><se_def>Marek: I, I am so cold...
I have to find a way to warm up...
<voice_0x01001314><se_def>Marek: What is that bag you have!?

<voice_0x01001315><se_def>Marek: Did you get it from an old babushka
called Marta?
<voice_0x01001316><se_def>Marek: So she asked you to bring it to me...?
<voice_0x01001317><se_def>Marek: Can you open the bag for me?
<voice_0x01001318><se_def>Marek: You must have! You got it from an old lady called Marta in the mountains, no?
There are some unfamiliar herbs in Marta's bag.
<voice_0x01001319><se_def>Marek: Nook grass! I knew it. Dobroe. This will be perfect. Normally we drink this diluted in tea, but now I must take it straight...

Marek swallows the nook grass neat,
straight out of the bag!
<voice_0x0100131A><se_def>Marek: Oh-yo-YOOOOOOY!!!

<voice_0x0100131B><se_def>Marek: Hurgh, hurgh.
So, nook grass must always be diluted!

<voice_0x0100131C><se_def>Marek: At least it was not the powdered form.
No one wants that up their nose!

<voice_0x0100131D><se_def>Marek: Anyway, now I am warm, that is for sure!
Thank you. You have saved me, my friends.
<voice_0x0100131E><se_def>Marek: And she saved me too. Now I believe her old saying that there is no bad without good. But how could she have known this would happen?

<voice_0x0100131F><se_def>Marek: If you are going back to Orkutsk,
perhaps we could travel together?
<voice_0x01001320><se_def>Marek: Thank you. I am very grateful.
<voice_0x01001321><se_def>Marek: If the wolves attack again, we are better to have safety in numbers.

<voice_0x01001322><se_def>Marek: So now you have given me the bag,
you wash your hands of me?
You are even colder than this cave!

<voice_0x01001323><se_def>Marek: If you are going back to Orkutsk,
perhaps we could travel together?
